title: Who takes over if our political leaders get ill? - Toronto Sun
description: Who takes over if our political leaders get ill? Toronto Sun Government warns against all international travel, limits inbound flights to stop spread of COVID-19 CBC.ca Coronavirus outbreak: Justin Trudeau's wife tests positive for COVID-19, PM to remain in i…
content: What happens if our political leaders get sick from COVID and can t do their jobs It s not a speculative question anymore now that we know Prime Minister Justin Trudeau s wife contracted the virus while visiting England The whole Trudeau family is curr chars
